name: rckangaroo-sass-kernels
notes: Place architecture-specific cubins in the paths listed above.
Runtime is SASS-only and will fail if cubin is absent or incompatible.
Set RCK_SASS_DIR to override the base sass directory at runtime.
Set RCK_SASS_CUBIN to load a direct cubin path.
Set RCK_SASS_VARIANT to try rckangaroo_kernels_<variant>.cubin before default.
Runtime launch geometry must match cubin compile-time geometry.
Use RCK_SASS_STRICT=1 (default) to lock launch geometry to cubin contract.
